pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, March 24, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montr√©al, Quebec

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Greek Independence Day Parade.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:15 p.m.
  • Parade begins on the corner of Jean-Talon and Hutchison Street
